projects.name: Valoarena
projects.description: A tournament booking platform for Valorant, allowing users to seamlessly create, manage, and join tournaments, driving community engagement and competitive interaction.

projects.name: Clinic360
projects.description: A Doctor Search & Appointment Booking System enabling patients to find doctors, book/cancel appointments, and manage consultation schedules with advanced features like JWT authentication and automated notifications.

projects.name: Trustcall
projects.description: A Spam Detection and Contact Search API, featuring advanced search capabilities, role-based access control, and optimized performance with Django ORM and Redis.

projects.name: Linkhub
projects.description: LinkHub is a sleek, Linktree-style page built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. It offers an easy-to-use admin dashboard for managing and analyzing links stats.

projects.name: Dexapp
projects.description: Mini version of cryptocurrency exchange with a liquidity provider interface and features like token transfer and swapping of tokens.

projects.name: ChatAI
projects.description: Developed an AI-driven chat platform with seamless user authentication using Clerk, providing real-time ChatGPT-like capabilities within a user-friendly dashboard.

projects.name: AI NFT generator
projects.description: An AI-powered platform that creates unique, one-of-a-kind NFTs by generating custom art pieces based on user inputs, utilizing machine learning algorithms to craft digital collectibles.

projects.name: Chatapp
projects.description: A real-time chat application that connects users through seamless messaging and interactive features. With a sleek interface and advanced functionalities, it enhances communication for individuals and groups alike.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: A portfolio website that showcases my projects, skills, and achievements in a clear layout. Built with Tailwind CSS for a responsive design, it highlights my work in software development.

extras.name: Blogapp
extras.description: A dynamic blogging platform that enables users to publish and explore a diverse range of articles. With intuitive navigation and customizable features, it fosters a vibrant community of writers and readers.

extras.name: Motion classification on ESP32
extras.description: The aim of the project was to implent a Neural Network on ESP32.
